data.lore: Cassiopeia is a terrifying creature - half woman, half snake - whose slightest glance brings death. The youngest daughter of one of Noxus' most influential families, she was once a beautiful and cunning temptress capable of manipulating the hardest heart. Transformed by the venom of an ancient Shuriman tomb guardian, she continues to serve Noxian interests as she always has, just in a more... visceral way.
data.name: Cassiopeia
data.title: the Serpent's Embrace

spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia blasts an area after a brief delay. Enemies in the area are Poisoned, taking {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia blasts an area after a brief delay. Enemies in the area are Poisoned, taking {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.name: Noxious Blast
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia releases a toxic cloud that grows in size over {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the cloud are Poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing them to take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

The cloud continually reapplies this Poison to enemies within it.
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia releases a toxic cloud that grows in size over {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the cloud are Poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing them to take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%. The cloud continually reapplies this Poison to enemies within it.
spells.name: Miasma
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.

spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to her target. If Twin Fang kills the target, Cassiopeia refunds its cost and restores {{ e10 }}% of her maximum Mana ({{ f3 }}). If the target is Poisoned, then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

Hitting an enemy with Twin Fang increases Cassiopeia's Poison damage dealt to the target by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e9 }} seconds. This effect stacks up to two times.
spells.description: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target, increasing further Poison damage dealt to the target. If the target dies, Cassiopeia regains Mana. If the target is poisoned, the cooldown of this spell is refreshed.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to her target. If Twin Fang kills the target, Cassiopeia refunds its cost and restores {{ e10 }}% of her maximum Mana ({{ f3 }}). If the target is Poisoned, then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Twin Fang increases Cassiopeia's Poison damage dealt to the target by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e9 }} seconds. This effect stacks up to two times.
spells.name: Twin Fang
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target, increasing further Poison damage dealt to the target. If the target dies, Cassiopeia regains Mana. If the target is poisoned, the cooldown of this spell is refreshed.

spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.
spells.name: Petrifying Gaze
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

passive.name: Aspect of the Serpent
passive.description: Cassiopeia gains stacks of Aspect of the Serpent over time and by poisoning enemy champions.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia gains stacks of Aspect of the Serpent over time and by poisoning enemy champions.
